ComicInfo.Summary: Jackie Estacado, the current bearer of the Darkness, often takes advantage of the fact that his enemies don't know the extent of his powers or his weakness to light. Captured by an old enemy Jackie will have to rely on his wits alone to survive. Meanwhile, Jackie's crew must deal with the Sovereign without their powerful boss to back them up !
ComicInfo.Tags: Kim,The Sovereign,Major White,Kentucky,Regis Tyne,Hunter-Killer,Dev Ravada,Kash O'Neal,Jackie Estacado,Marisol,Vike
ComicInfo.Title: The Hunting Party, Part 2
